subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Ty Conklin made 25 saves and the Detroit Red Wings took the overall N.H.L. lead with 3-2 victory over the faltering Colorado Avalanche in Denver.
snippet: Ty Conklin made 25 saves and the Detroit Red Wings took the overall N.H.L. lead with 3-2 victory over the faltering Colorado Avalanche in Denver.
